songs.title: What Now (Firebeatz Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
What now?
I just can't figure it out
What now?
I guess I'll just wait it out
What now?
Please tell me
What now?

[Drop: Firebeatz & Rihanna]
What now?

[Pre-Chorus]
Whatever it is
It feels like it's laughing at me through the glass of a two-sided mirror
Whatever it is
It's just laughing at me
And I just wanna scream

[Chorus]
What now?
I just can't figure it out
What now?
I guess I'll just wait it out
What now?
Please tell me
What now?

[Drop: Firebeatz & Rihanna]
What now?
